result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Kenneth J. Gerhardt
Current: 486 Hill Street, Green Lake County Jail, Green Lake, WI 54941 United States  (Effective: 04-15-2016)
Prior: Clark County Jail 517 Court St, Neillsville, WI 54456

Prosecutor,Kerra Stumbris, and Defendant, Kenneth J. Gerhardt in custody, appeared with Attorney Paul M Fredrickson. Joint recommendation stated. Notice issues were made. Defendant enters a plea of guilty to Count 1 in 2016CF16. Court finds defendant guilty of 2016CF16 Count 1 as amended, 100 days in County Jail, 60 days credit, provide DNA sample, costs due 1/15/17, consecutive to any other sentence.  Counts 2 and 3 are dismissed and read in.  Court finds 2016CM49 Counts 1 and 2 are Dismissed and read in.

Pre-trial conference at 03-22-2016 11:30 am.
Status conference at 04-07-2016 01:40 pm.

Prosecutor Kerra Stumbris and Defendant, Kenneth J. Gerhardt, appeared by video from Clark County Jail, with Attorney Paul M Fredrickson appearing in person in court.    Defendant acknowledged receipt of complaint.  Waived reading of the complaint  THE DEFENDANT ENTERED A PLEA OF NOT GUILTY  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 22, 2016 at 11:30 am.  Status conference scheduled for April 7, 2016 at 01:40 pm.
